title: Glu Mobile reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) _ Glu Mobile Inc. (GLUU) on Thursday reported a loss of $39.6 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Francisco-based company said it had a loss of 29 cents. Losses, adjusted for asset impairment costs and stock option expense, came to 14 cents per share.
The results missed Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for a loss of 3 cents per share.
The mobile game maker posted revenue of $80.2 million in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $83.2 million, exceeding Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $78.5 million.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $97.6 million, or 72 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $320.4 million.
For the current quarter ending in April, Glu Mobile said it expects revenue in the range of $72 million to $74 million.
The company expects full-year revenue in the range of $325 million to $335 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, the company's shares hit $3.42. A year ago, they were trading at $2.49.
